tool.name: Split models

param.name: chk_compress
param.label: Create a compressed file with all the splited files?

tool.help:
**What it does** ::
This tool splits the models inside one PDB file into several PDB files. Each model will be a PDB file in your history.
::
The output file(s) will be renamed using the name of the input PDB file. Exemple: If the input PDB file has the name PDBfile.pdb, the result(s) will be named as:
- PDBfile-M1.pdb - PDBfile-M2.pdb...
where M1 means the model that is described in that PDB file.
::
If you select to have an output with the PDB files compressed, the tool will generate another dataset with a zip file that contains all the splited PDB files.
-----
.. class:: warningmark
To see all the output files, you wiil need to refresh your history.
